attributes.action: make every effort to ensure that all British students are given the opportunity to study and learn from the written works of Neil Peart.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Neil Peart, one of the finest sing writers, is currently writing some of his best work. His work has been sadly overlooked by the litary world, often misunderstood.
I believe it would a great educational aid for his work and writings to be studied at length, as they are more relevant in the modern day. His observations of both the world and the current events are thought provoking.
Please join me by signing this petition to improve the education of every British child.
In the meantime I would encourage you to seek out his works, mainly lyrics for Rush, and take time to explore their meaning.
